oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriter Session - Shelly Fairchild and Ira Dean - 2018-08-04
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by songwriters Shelly Fairchild and Ira Dean from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on August 4, 2018.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Shelly Fairchild; Ira Dean;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Walk-in music / (04:07) Opening comments and songwriters introductions by Kayleigh Shoemaker / (08:01) Opening comments by Shelly and Ira / (10:13) Shelly introduces the first song / (11:19) Performs You Don't Lie Here Anymore (Shelly) / (14:15) Shelly tells story about Connie Smith and performing on the Grand Ole Opry / (15:40) Ira introduces the next song / (16:20) Performs Pour Me (Ira) / (19:12) Ira talks about the audience / (20:55) Shelly introduces the next song / (21:43) Performs Mississippi's Crying (Shelly) / (26:14) Ira introduces the next song / (27:17) Performs Feeling Like That (Ira) / (31:30) Shelly introduces the next song with comments on the audience from Ira / (34:23) Performs House On Fire (Shelly) / (38:48) Introduces the next song / (38:54) Performs One In Every Crowd (Ira) / (42:30) Introduces the next song / (43:26) Performs Get Out Of The Road (Shelly and Ira) / (47:28) Shelly talks about writing songs in Nashville / (48:10) Shelly introduces the next song / (48:37) Performs Unidentified song likely titled Make Your Heart My Home (Shelly and Ira) / (52:10) Final comments / (52:19) Walk-out music / (52:41) FILE END
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Fairchild, Shelly; Dean, Ira; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
